live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43588.summary: Some customers in the North Bluff Rd area of White Rock are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43588.title: Nov 3 – White Rock (North Bluff Rd) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
